channel.title: Join server, pick location
channel.description:
Hi, it's me again.
I was wondering if there's a way to make it so that when someone first joins the server, it asks them where they would like to start. Say this for example.
Where would you like to start your adventure?
Varrock Falador
but when they join the server again it wouldn't do that, only when they first make a name.
Thanks![br][size=1]Posted on: August 27, 2007, 09:19:46 AM[/size][hr]Also, does anyone have the code for the server information in the corner of the screen?
Like this picture...
[img]http://img47.imageshack.us/img47/7562/untitledpo0.png[/img]

item.title: Join server, pick location
item.dc:creator: @EmoJuiceBox EmoJuiceBox
item.description:
@EmoJuiceBox wrote:

K, well I put that before the welcome message. But it came up with an error when I compiled. Where do I put this?

Read full topic

item.title: Join server, pick location
item.dc:creator: @S_C_A_R_Bot S C A R Bot
item.description:
@S_C_A_R_Bot wrote:

Send a dialouge with 2 options.

case 1: sendFrame200(4883, 591);//4883 is NPC id you will see when dialouge is turned on sendFrame126(GetNpcName(c.NpcTalkTo), 4884); sendFrame126("Where would you like to start?", 4885); client.sendFrame75(c, c.NpcTalkTo, 4883); client.sendFrame164(c, 4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; break; case 2: sendFrame171(4883, 2465); sendFrame171(0, 2468); sendFrame126(c, "Select an Option", 2460); sendFrame126(c, "Varrock", 2461); sendFrame126(c, "Falador", 2462); sendFrame164(c, 2459); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

and add an action to it to teleport.

Read full topic
